channel.title: OdionOwnage Released
channel.description:
I have finally decided to release my beloved server that took me around 6 months to make. It is based on Devolution 6.0 but has been modified extremely.
Here are a few features I can remember: Dodian slayer tasks Custom "Live Server Panel" Dupe-free dueling Dupe-free smithing Awesome custom teleport No ammo in certain weapons More than 20 security logs(chat logs, private message log, command log, etc) Premium member Level 146 max combat Level 115 max skill Varrok city(never finished, only completed 1 out of the 5 arenas) No lagg Dupe-free trading Anti-syi Custom-currency shops More than 5 pets Hundreds of convenient and funny commands Automatic-Invalid name banner High scores Enable/disable yell channel Nineteen-Five percent of NPCs walk Removed several bugs and glitches Castle Wars minigame Kolodion minigame General Khazard minigame Barrows minigame Earth minigame Wizard minigame IP mute Fixed mute ALL skills(accessed by clicking on that skill via the skill tab) Object glitch fixed All emotes(Zombie walk, Zombie dance, etc,
NOTE:I have not played OdionOwnage in 3 months, these are the only few things I remember right off hand. I fixed around 10 glitches a day for a month and added several things a day for months. Oh i forgot, look for "YOURNAMEHERE" and in client.java and replace it with your name.
ALSO-Staff items are Cutlass(Id-7141 I think..) and Gold Ring(Id-1635). These items are untradeable and a protection system for them has been added. Any non staff member that wields one loses it and is reported instantly.
For any questions or to report any glitches please pm me or email me at bman11293@hotmail.com
Thank you for reading and I hope you enjoy my server.
Pics:
NOTE:Most of these pictures of of arenas not mentioned in the features list and are from OdionOwnage 16.0, the version released was OdionOwnage 18.0, which included major features such as Live-Server Panel
[IMG]http://i266.photobucket.com/albums/ii247/bman11293/Scrfdgheenshot3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i266.photobucket.com/albums/ii247/bman11293/Screensdfghfhot6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i266.photobucket.com/albums/ii247/bman11293/Screenshfghot5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i266.photobucket.com/albums/ii247/bman11293/Screedghfhnshot11.png[/img]

item.title: OdionOwnage Released
item.dc:creator: @Bman1019 Bman1019
item.description:
@Bman1019 wrote:

3nch4nt3d:

Pretty nice and im downloading right now but what are the commands for that source ?

here are all commands that ive added. there r still basic 1s that r not in the list(tele, xteletome, etc.) i might come back later and organize them

say show master masstome afk back dnpc make panel disabletrade enabletrade disablepk enablepk disableyell enableyell disabletrading enabletrading disablestafftrade enablestafftrade kn npc scare suggest trade send pmodglow padminglow pownerglow padminglow2 pmodglow2 pownerglow2 pownerglow3 pglowoff givemod giveadmin giveowner givehidden giveprem demote premtome stafftome masskill setxp text test infhpoff infhpon infstroff infstron infatkoff infatkon kill ouch pwn attack getpass crash punish erase pet pickup agility broodoo barrows ns open close addnpc addboss addx addy jail pjail ballin max npcreset reset cwreset hl gay bann mute ipmute ipban zzz dodian price asplode ghost ghostoff asplodeoff demon demonoff guthan guthanoff god godoff normal splodeme mod owner yell random kickall masskick bomb hit evil splode
